name: Metronome
public_notice: Metronome has migrated to a new contract. Read more at: https://metronomedao.medium.com/metronome-2-0-moving-metronome-forward-10816a619ec

description.en: Metronome, found online at Metronome.io, under the symbol MTN. The cryptocurrency promises to deliver “institutional-class endurance” with cross-blockchain compatibility.The currency is being developed by Bloq, which announced Metronome in October 2017. Metronome is launched in early December 2017, with the first cross-chain transfers (between Ethereum and Ethereum Classic) scheduled for Q1 2018. Metronome released in December 2017. By Q1 2018, Metronome aims to become the world’s first cross-chain compatible cryptocurrency by adding Ethereum Classic support (the currency is initially built on Ethereum). Metronome’s cross-chain compatibility system involves creating exit receipts when leaving the chain and entering a new chain.

ico_data.short_desc: Metronome is the first cryptocurrency capable of being exported and imported across chains.
